summary: A free-spirited yet naive country girl is caught between her wealthy, manipulative "cousin" Alec and the handsome, educated farmer Angel Clare in this Victorian tragedy from novelist Thomas Hardy.
cast: Justine Waddell|Jason Flemyng|Oliver Milburn|John McEnery|Lesley Dunlop|Rosalind Knight|Anthony O'Donnell|Christine Moore|Bryan Pringle|Debbie Chazen|Candida Rundle|Amanda Brewster|Linda Armstrong|Hannah Waterman|Charlotte Bellamy|Amanda Loy-Ellis|Luke Graham|Cheryl Heuston|Trevor Martin|Penny Morrell|Gerald James
keywords: character name as title|forename in title|relative|thomas hardy|tragedy
title: Tess of the D'Urbervilles
